| HistoryText             = When [[St'vaan (Eurth) (Earth-616)|St'vaan]] became king of [[Avalon]], he sought to create a group of knights worthy of his kingdom. Searching far and wide, caring not about gender or race, he gathered warriors, wizards and champions from all the surrounding tribes to forge the Champions of the Realm.{{r|Avataars: Covenant of the Shield Vol 1 1}}
